content: **materials** 1 skein 3 oz charcoal 1 skein 3 oz silver service 1 skein 3 oz claret one size us i-9 5 5 mm or size to obtain gauge one decorative button 7/8 /22 mm yarn needle **gauge** in ripple pattern using i-9 5 5 mm hook 1 ripple and 13 row = 4 /10 cm **note** in the magazine this appears as her aspen neck warmer also available in the magazine is his aspen neck warmer >note from designer this pattern is no longer available on the caron website i have been given written permission to post the pdfs of my free caron patterns on ravelry
